name: Premier Remediation
description: Premier Remediation provides commercial mold remediation, water damage mitigation, and fire & smoke cleanup in San Francisco, CA and the Bay Area. We help property managers and owners restore buildings fast with less downtime. Our team is commercial-first and built for large sites like apartment complexes, high-rises, hotels, and retail spaces. We run tight containment, HEPA air filtration, and detailed cleaning to stop spread and protect occupants. We also coordinate third-party clearance testing and provide clear documentation for compliance and sign-off. Available 24/7, we often arrive within hours depending on location and the emergency. With 10 years in business, Premier Remediation is licensed, insured, and focused on operational continuity. From initial assessment to drying, removal, and verification, we manage the full remediation process so you can reopen sooner and with confidence.

owner.name: Juan Mejia
owner.bio: Premier Remediation stands as a leading commercial-first restoration company, proudly serving the Bay Area for over 10 years. Specializing in comprehensive water, mold, and fire damage remediation, we understand the critical importance of operational continuity and minimal disruption for large-scale commercial properties. Our expertise ensures that apartment complexes, high-rises, hotels, and various retail and commercial facilities can recover swiftly and efficiently from unforeseen incidents.

uniqueSellingPoints: Commercial-first remediation built for large, complex sites
24/7 emergency response with on-site arrival often within hours
End-to-end process: contain, remove, dry, clean, verify
Third-party clearance testing coordination and closeout documentation
Minimal disruption planning for tenants, guests, and customers

keywords: commercial water damage restoration Bay Area
seo.aeoSnippet: Premier Remediation is a Bay Area commercial-first restoration company providing 24/7 mold remediation, water damage mitigation, fire and smoke cleanup, and asbestos/lead abatement, plus third-party clearance testing support and documentation.
seo.geoEntity: Premier Remediation is a commercial restoration and remediation company based at 1030 Duane Ave, Santa Clara, CA 95054, serving San Francisco and the Bay Area. Services include mold remediation, water damage mitigation, fire/smoke cleanup, commercial and multifamily remediation, asbestos and lead abatement, and clearance verification support. Licensed and insured. 24/7 response.
